extracted_playbook.title: Update SIMATIC RF1140R and RF1170R
extracted_playbook.description: Update SIMATIC RF1140R (6GT2831-6CB00) and SIMATIC RF1170R (6GT2831-6BB00) to version V1.1 or later.

extracted_playbook.title: Update SIMATIC RF166C, RF185C, RF186C, RF186CI, RF188C, RF188CI
extracted_playbook.description: Update SIMATIC RF166C (6GT2002-0EE20), RF185C (6GT2002-0JE10), RF186C (6GT2002-0JE20), RF186CI (6GT2002-0JE50), RF188C (6GT2002-0JE40), RF188CI (6GT2002-0JE60) to version V2.2 or later.

extracted_playbook.title: Update SIMATIC RF360R
extracted_playbook.description: Update SIMATIC RF360R (6GT2801-5BA30) to version V2.2 or later.

extracted_playbook.title: Update SIMATIC Reader RF610R, RF615R, RF650R, RF680R, RF685R
extracted_playbook.description: Update SIMATIC Reader RF610R, RF615R, RF650R, RF680R, RF685R to version V4.2 or later.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Protect network access to devices with appropriate mechanisms and configure the environment according to Siemens' operational guidelines for industrial security.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Locate Control System Networks Behind Firewalls
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as VPNs. Ensure VPNs are updated to the most recent version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures and report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
